headline: Atmos Energy (ATO) Draws Mixed Calls as UBS Raises Target, Morgan Stanley Downgrades
summary: Atmos Energy Corporation (NYSE:ATO) is included among the 14 Best Dividend Aristocrats to Invest in Heading into 2026. On December 17, UBS raised its price target on Atmos Energy Corporation (NYSE:ATO) to $174 from $159 and kept a Neutral rating on the shares. The update reflected a more constructive view on valuation, even as broader […]

headline: 4 Low-Beta Defensive Stocks to Buy as Consumer Confidence Plummets
summary: With consumer confidence sliding, low-beta defensive picks like ATO, AWR, SRE and INGR stand out as investors look to limit downside risk.
